oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tennessee Supreme Court, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of the Tennessee Supreme Court Building located at 401 Seventh Avenue North, adjacent to the Capitol and War Memorial Building. This structure exemplifies a Greek Doric design that was very modern for its time. Built of Tennessee marble at a cost of $750,000, this Tennessee Supreme Court Building was dedicated December 4th, 1937. Forms part of the Nashville Room Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee. Supreme Court
